thread.title: China Telecom Names Chang Xiaobing As CEO With Immediate Effect
thread.title_full: China Telecom Names Chang Xiaobing As CEO With Immediate Effect

author: morningstar.com
title: China Telecom Names Chang Xiaobing As CEO With Immediate Effect
text:
By Joanne Chiu
China Telecom Corp. (0728.HK) said Tuesday it has appointed Chang Xiaobing as its chief executive, with immediate effect.
Mr. Chang, 58, was the chairman of rival China Unicom (Hong Kong) Ltd. (0762.HK) before the latest appointment. He has also been appointed as chairman of China Telecommunications Corp.
Write to Joanne Chiu at joanne.chiu@wsj.com
September 01, 2015 05:34 ET (09:34
